pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Catalyst plates are primarily to support certain rituals by supplying additional ingredients.$(br2)$(info) See the $(l:rituals/catalyst_plates)entry on Catalyst Plates in the Rituals section$() for full information.$(br2)$(info) Reinforced catalyst plates are immune to damage from vanilla bosses such as the Wither or the Ender Dragon, as well as highly resistant to explosions.
